thread.title: Competition: win a Geberit AquaClean Sela shower toilet
thread.title_full: Competition: win a Geberit AquaClean Sela shower toilet - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Competition: win a Geberit AquaClean Sela shower toilet
text: Geberit is giving one lucky reader the chance to enhance their bathroom experience . Enter the prize draw to be in with a chance of winning a Geberit AquaClean Sela shower toilet, DuoFresh frame and Sigma40 Flush plate. Leading its field in sanitary design, the AquaClean range offers the ultimate in comfort, hygiene and style and aims to change not only our preconceptions about hygiene and cleanliness in the bathroom, but also aesthetic appeal. For the chance to add a bit of luxury to your bathroom, simply complete the form below by midnight on Sunday, October 11, 2015 Online Form - Competition: win a Geberit AquaClean Sela shower toilet
